verses.verse: <S%G1691>I<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G2038>work<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of him who <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G2193>while<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%> The <S%G3571>night<s%> is <S%G2064>coming,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> no <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2038>work.<s%>
<S%G3752>While<s%> I <S%G5600>am<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%> of the <S%G2889>world.<s%>"

When he <S%G2036>had<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G5023>this,<s%> he <S%G4429>spat<s%> on the <S%G5476>ground,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G4081>mud<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> the <S%G4427>saliva,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2025%G99999>anointed<s%> the blind <S%G5185>man<s%>'s <S%G3788>eyes<s%> with the <S%G4081>mud,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G5217>"Go,<s%> <S%G3538>wash<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G2861>pool<s%> of <S%G4611>Siloam<s%>" <S%G3739>(which<s%> <S%G2059>means<s%> <S%G649>"Sent<s%>"). So he went <S%G565>away,<s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3538>washed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> back <S%G991>seeing.<s%>

<S%G1565>He<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> "A <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G4081>mud,<s%> <S%G2025>anointed<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G5217><s%> "'Go <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G2861>pool<s%> of <S%G4611>Siloam,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3538>wash.<s%>'" <S%G1161>So<s%> I <S%G565>went<s%> away <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3538>washed,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> I received <S%G308>sight.<s%>"

<S%G3825>Again<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2065>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> he received his <S%G1161>sight.<s%> He <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> "He <S%G2007>put<s%> mud <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> I <S%G3538>washed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G991>see.<s%>"

<S%G5100>Some<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G5083>keep<s%> the <S%G4521>Sabbath.<s%>" <S%G243>Others<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G4459>"How<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> who is a <S%G268>sinner<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G4592>signs?<s%>" <S%G2532>There<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4978>division<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

Therefore they <S%G3004>asked<s%> the blind <S%G5185>man<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> do <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G455>opened<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G1161>eyes?<s%>" He <S%G3754>said,<s%> "He <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G4396>prophet.<s%>"

<S%G3767>The<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> therefore <S%G4100>did<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he had <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G5185>blind,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> had received his <S%G308>sight,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G3755><s%> they <S%G5455>called<s%> the <S%G1118>parents<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%> who had received his <S%G308>sight,<s%>

<S%G846>His<s%> <S%G1118>parents<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G5399>feared<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> had <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G4934>agreed<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> would <S%G3670>confess<s%> him <S%G846>as<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> he would be <S%G1096>put<s%> out of the <S%G656>synagogue.<s%>

<S%G3767>So<s%> <S%G5455>they<s%> called the <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G5185>blind<s%> a <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G1537>time,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1325>"Give<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%> <S%G2249>We<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G268>sinner.<s%>"

<S%G1565>He<s%> therefore <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> "I <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G268>sinner.<s%> One <S%G1520>thing<s%> I do <S%G1492>know:<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> though I <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G5185>blind,<s%> <S%G737>now<s%> I <S%G991>see.<s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G2036>They<s%> said to <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> did <S%G4160>he<s%> do to <S%G4671>you?<s%> <S%G4459>How<s%> did <S%G455>he<s%> open <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3788>eyes?<s%>"

He <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> "I <S%G2036>told<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2235>already,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> you <S%G191>didn't<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G191>listen.<s%> <S%G5101>Why<s%> do <S%G2309>you<s%> want to <S%G191>hear<s%> it <S%G3361>again?<s%> <S%G5210>You<s%> <S%G2532>don't<s%> also <S%G2309>want<s%> to <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> do you?"

<S%G2249>We<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to <S%G3475>Moses.<s%> But as <S%G1161>for<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G3756>man,<s%> we don't <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4159>where<s%> he comes <S%G2076>from.<s%>"

<S%G1161>We<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G191>listen<s%> to <S%G268>sinners,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G5600>is<s%> a worshipper of <S%G2318>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>does<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2307>will,<s%> he <S%G191>listens<s%> to <S%G5127>him.<s%>

<S%G1537>Since<s%> the world <S%G165>began<s%> <S%G191>it<s%> has <S%G3756>never<s%> been <S%G191>heard<s%> of <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G3788>eyes<s%> of someone <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G5185>blind.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G1473>"I<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G2917>judgment,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> those who <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G991>see<s%> may <S%G991>see;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> that those who see <S%G991>may<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G5185>blind.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> you <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G302>blind,<s%> you would <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G266>sin;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> you <S%G3754>say,<s%> <S%G991><s%> 'We see.' <S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G3306>remains.<s%>"
